item.title: Granblue Fantasy coming to Steam on March 10, 2026 in the west
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Not compatible with the existing mobile and browser versions.

Cygames will release a Steam version of Granblue Fantasy on March 10, 2026 in the west, the company announced.

The Steam version will not be available to users in certain regions, including Japan. It also cannot be played with an existing Granblue Fantasy account, meaning it will run separately from the current mobile and PC browser versions.

Granblue Fantasy is currently playable in both English and Japanese wherever it is available. However, the iOS and Android versions have never been officially released on western app stores. Excluding the browser version, the Steam version will mark the first time the game has had a proper western release in the 12 years since its initial launch on March 10, 2014.
